oai_dc:dc.dc:title: IBM Building, 1961
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the new IBM building, located at 450 James Robertson Parkway, 8 November 1961. The building site was located on Parcel D of the Capitol Hill Redevelopment Project area. Dedicated in June of 1961, the contemporary-styled, three-story structure was constructed by Burr Avenue, Inc. of Columbus, Ohio and designed by the architectural firm Curtis and Davis and Associates of New Orleans. Photoraphed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
